Title: Honor Among Thieves
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created by), David Slack, Dan Dietz (story editor), Lucas O'Connor (story editor)
Actors: Jim Caviezel, Kevin Chapman, Amy Acker, Sarah Shahi
Plot: Shaw joins a team of international thieves in order to keep tabs on the latest POI, but an unexpected turn of events puts her in danger of being detected by Samaritan. Also, Finch and Root undertake a dangerous sabotage mission.
